Zamorak mages are monsters found in the Ourania Cave, and guard the short path to the Ourania Altar for the Zamorak Magical Institute.

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%

    • 2.3 Other
  • 3 See also

'''Zamorak mages''' are monsters found in the [[Ourania Cave]], and guard the short path to the [[Ourania Altar]] for the [[Zamorak Magical Institute]].

==Locations==

}}
{{LocTableBottom}}
